document_data.name: House of Alon
document_data.leader: [[Alad bin Alaq bin Alonka]] in [[1367 DR]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Alon''' was the historical ruling family of the island of [[Afyal]] located in the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region of [[east Zakhara]].
document_data.History:
The distant progenitors of the House of Alon founded the island kingdom of Afyal shortly after the rise of the [[Law of the Loregiver]] and [[Enlightenment]] swept though mainland [[Zakhara]], nearly 500 years ago as of [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}}. The House of Alon shared royal blood with the very first [[Grand Caliph]], a fact of which they were very proud.

The members of this ruling family were always eccentric, but leaned more and more toward madness as time went by.
document_data.Members: The Padishah of [[Medina al-Afyal]] in [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}} was [[Alad bin Alaq bin Alonka]], also known as the "Mad Padishah."
